sn51.9:1.1: “‘Ayam chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:1.2: ‘So kho panayam chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …
sn51.9:1.3: ‘bhavito’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:2.1: ‘Ayam viriyasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:2.2: ‘So kho panayam viriyasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …
sn51.9:2.3: ‘bhavito’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:3.1: ‘Ayam cittasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:3.2: ‘So kho panayam cittasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …
sn51.9:3.3: ‘bhavito’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:4.1: ‘Ayam vimamsasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn51.9:4.2: ‘So kho panayam vimamsasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagato iddhipado bhavetabbo’ti me, bhikkhave …
sn51.9:4.3: ‘bhavito’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”ti.
